algorithm_technique: Aho-Corasick algorithm for efficient multi-pattern string matching.
problem_summary_simple: Find all substrings of a text that match any word in a given list.
problem_summary_technical: Utilize the Aho-Corasick algorithm with a Trie to find all occurrences of given words within a text string.
time_complexity: O(N + M + Z), where N is total length of words, M is length of text, Z is number of matches.
space_complexity: O(T), where T is the total size of the Trie.
key_insights: The Aho-Corasick algorithm is highly efficient for finding multiple patterns in a text.
Building the Trie with reversed words allows for matching from right to left, simplifying index calculation.
The suffix links in the Aho-Corasick automaton are key to handling overlapping matches and efficient transitions.
